channel.title: [PI] Crowns?
channel.description:
How do I make a crown (silver or gold) appear with a sendMessage?
I'm trying to make it so when you ::yell instead of it saying [Admin][name]: (message) it says:
[[img]http://www.runescape.com/img/forum/crown_gold.gif[/img]][name]: (message)
On my 508 it's something like <img=1> or something. Is that the same case with project insanity?

item.title: [PI] Crowns?
item.dc:creator: @infestor1 infestor1
item.description:
@infestor1 wrote:

How do I make a crown (silver or gold) appear with a sendMessage?

I’m trying to make it so when you ::yell instead of it saying [Admin][name]: (message) it says:

[][name]: (message)

On my 508 it’s something like <img=1> or something. Is that the same case with project insanity?

Read full topic
